articles.author: TOH TING WEI
articles.title: Asean and European Union conclude landmark aviation agreement to improve air connectivity - The Straits Times
articles.description: The agreement is the first region-to-region aviation agreement in the world.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Asean and the European Union (EU) have agreed on a landmark aviation agreement that will allow for more flights between the two regions.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Factbox: Countries vaccinating children against COVID-19 - Reuters
articles.description: The European Commission on Friday authorized Pfizer-BioNTech's (PFE.N), (22UAy.DE) COVID-19 vaccine for use in children as young as 12, paving the way for a broader roll-out in the EU after similar clearances in the United States and Canada.
